metadata.dc:author: Contreras Hernández, Iris
Mould Quevedo, Joaquín F
Garrido Solano, Carlos
Salinas Escudero, Guillermo
metadata.dc:description: The paper reviews the outcomes and failures of the Swedish health care reform, as well as the lessons learned for accomplishing better financial results and quality standards.
metadata.dc:title: Competencia en el sector salud: análisis de la reforma sueca (1992-1995).
[Competitiveness in the health care sector: analysis of the Swedish reform (1992-1995)].
